overview.en: X-found world is a global ecosystem of ecological value systems. It changes the game industry architecture based on decentralization. Through the introduction of the common token business model, the value transfer system, the sharing economy, and the game ecosystem solve the current game. Industry advertising structure, marketing, and user issues, and then lead to a win-win ecosystem.
overview.zh: X-Found World是一个全球的生态价值体系圈，以去中心化为基础改变游戏行业体系结构，通过引入通用代币的商业模式，以价值流转体系、分享经济体系、游戏生态体系解决现阶段游戏行业广告结构、营销、用户间的问题，进而形成一个价值共赢的生态圈。
